job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent knowledge and skills obtained through a combination of education, training, and experience in a Healthcare environment.

jd: From: Jyoti Mittal, KPG99 Inc jyotim@kpgtech.com Reply to: jyotim@kpgtech.com Hi,My name is Jyoti and I represent KPG99 INC. We work with clients across the USA. I have a very urgent role. If interested then please share with me your updated resume along with below information.
